Which Otter is right for you?

We have 8 years of experience recruiting and hiring senior remote developers who speak great English, work in congruent time zones, love writing beautiful code, and would love to join your team — full-time, part-time, or flexible.

Junior Otter

Backend Developer

$30-35 / hour

  • Flexible hours
  • 15+ hours per week
  • Bug fixes and QA
  • 1 project manager

Senior Otter

Full Stack Developer

$40-45 / hour

  • Set schedule
  • 30+ hours per week
  • Heavy development
  • 1 product manager

Lead Otter

Full Stack Developer

$50+ / hour

  • Set schedule
  • 40+ hours per week
  • Heavy development
  • 1 product manager
